channel.title: [PI]Rune-X-Scape V1 Release
channel.description:
Rune-X-Scape V1 RELEASE! [img]http://i.picasion.com/pic39/82723cb790ade14678a81b7a7777190c.gif[/img]
[b]Information:[/b] Base: Project Insanity
[b]Credits:[/b] Sanity Sagi Chri55w (me)
[b]Download Links[/b] Server - [url=http://up.ht/mz9swv]Download[/url] Client - [url=http://up.ht/ip4ssP]Download[/url] Cache(put in C:\ ) - [url=http://up.ht/jnGwSI]Download[/url]
Please message me if links go down and ill re upload :)
have been using this source for almost 2 months however have decided to switch base so im releasing this source with the work i have done to it,
i used sagi x evolution as the base to make the server and have added a few fixes, and extras, it isnt much but is a good base with a lot of potential, in our first month running we took in over £700 ($1142)
have fun leeching but please leave comments with feedback and suggestions for a possible V2
[u]Fixes[/u] Mute system - easy fix but many PI's dont have :S Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker Made client window non resizable fixed remove X dupe method fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours) fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out
[u]Additions[/u] Kalphite queen with working animations working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points) working tokul shops kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab quick chat fully working where it doesnt say "0 hans" when you have no task Edgeville home with all alters and shop added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom "combat potion" re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying fully working exp lamps use "agility top" on agility npc's for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets) added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness) added lots of teleports
items kept on death (new interface) - 70% some of text doesnt show (check printscreens)
[u][b]PRINTSCREENS[/b][/u] [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/365/loginscreenj.png[/img] [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/3084/characterr.png[/img] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/6874/homedf.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/1269/altars.png[/img] http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/5417/customso.png [img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/1032/itemsondeath.png[/img] [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6615/shopsq.png[/img] [img]http://img852.imageshack.us/img852/4642/killpoints.png[/img] [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/7598/agilshop.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/8513/agilityb.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/7748/explamp.png[/img] [img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/4500/questtabd.png[/img] [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/4161/armavf.png[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/7633/bandosb.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/2834/saraa.png[/img] [img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/8480/zammy.png[/img] [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2023/kalphite.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/8592/memleak.png[/img]
[b]guides[/b] [u]to change the IP[/u] go to client.java and search for [code]server =[/code] change the [code]127.0.0.1[/code] to your IP or no-ip address, save and compile and your done
[u]to enable x10 hit multiplier[/u] go to client.java and search for: [code]public static boolean newDamage = false;[/code] change the "false" to "true", save and compile
Hope you all like it :) - COMMENT WITH SUGGESTIONS :D
